title: Senior Software Engineer
summary: The people here at Apple don’t just create products — they create the kind of wonder that’s revolutionized entire industries. It’s the diversity of those people and their ideas that inspires the innovation that runs through everything we do, from amazing technology to industry-leading environmental efforts. Join Apple, and help us leave the world better than we found it!
description: We are looking for an experienced software engineer. In this role, you will work closely day-to-day with other engineers, users, and business leaders to plan, design, build, and ship high quality software. Responsibilities include architecting and implementing services, best practices, promoting technical excellence, and more.
key_qualifications: Deep hands-on experience in designing, building, delivering critical software; Proficient in at least one programming language; Familiarity with version control systems, CI/CD, testing, and cloud platforms; Excellent problem-solving and communication skills; Experience with Agile or Kanban methodologies.
preferred_qualifications: Proficiency in advanced SQL and performance tuning; Understanding of security and networking principles; Familiarity with Kubernetes and Infrastructure as Code concepts.
education_experience: BS/MS in CS/CE or equivalent experience.
pay_benefits: At Apple, base pay ranges between $175,800 and $264,200. Employees also have the opportunity to become Apple shareholders, receive comprehensive medical and dental coverage, retirement benefits, discounts, education reimbursement, bonuses, and more. Learn more about Apple benefits at the provided link.
